member.summary: The combined chord/scale note definitions. Scripts can add customs. Key is chord/scale name, value is list of constituent notes.

member.summary: Convert note number into name.
member.returns: The note name or empty if invalid.

member.summary: Parse note or notes from input value.

member.summary: Is it a white key?

member.summary: Get interval offset from name.

member.summary: Get interval name from note number offset.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MusicLib.MusicDefs.FormatNotes(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32})
member.summary: Try to make a note and/or chord string from the param. If it can't find a chord return the individual notes.

member.summary: Add a new chord or scale definition.

member.name: P:Ephemera.MusicLib.Properties.Resources.music_defs
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to ; The music components definitions.
; All the builtin scale defs. [scales] ;Scale = Notes (Description ,Lower tetrachord,Upper tetrachord) Acoustic = 1 2 3 #4 5 6 b7 (Acoustic ,whole tone ,minor) Aeolian = 1 2 b3 4 5 b6 b7 (Aeolian mode or natural minor ,minor ,Phrygian) NaturalMinor = 1 2 b3 4 5 b6 b7 (Aeolian m [rest of string was truncated]";.
